title: Talk "Applications of optimal transport in machine learning" with Thibault Groueix
Talk "Deep Learning for 3D surface reconstruction" with Thibault Groueix
body:
December 18th: Telecom ParisTech, Paris, France
January 25th: IGN, Paris, France
January 29th: ONERA, Palaiseau, France
May 7th: LRI, Paris, France [slides]

title: Beginning internship at Adobe Research
Our paper Pose from Shape: Deep Pose Estimation for Arbitrary 3D Objects was accepted at BMVC 2019
Our paper Surface Reconstruction from 3D Line Segments was accepted as an oral (Top 14%) at 3DV 2019
Our patent Reconstructing three-dimensional scenes using multi-view cycle projection is published.
Our paper 3D Reconstruction by Parametrized Surface Mapping was accepted at ICIP 2021.
Our paper NeeDrop: Unsupervised Shape Representation from Sparse Point Clouds using Needle Dropping was accepted at 3DV 2021.
I have publicly defended my thesis at Ecole des Ponts!
body: Ecole des Ponts ParisTech, Champs-sur-Marne, France

title: Our paper VASAD: a Volume and Semantic dataset for Building Reconstruction from Point Clouds was accepted at ICPR 2022
